mapper.insert: insert into chas_yw_jhry (id, isdel, data_flag, lrr_sfzh, lrsj, xgr_sfzh, xgsj, baqid, baqmc, ryxm, jhrwbh, rybh, mjjh, dwdm, dwmc, sjbq) values (#{id,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{isdel,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{dataFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lrsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{baqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{baqmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ryxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jhrwbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mjjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dwdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sjbq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update chas_yw_jhry set ISDEL = #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DATA_FLAG = #{dataFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, LRR_SFZH = #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LRSJ = #{lrsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, XGR_SFZH = #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XGSJ = date_trunc('second', now()), baqid = #{baqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, baqmc = #{baqmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ryxm = #{ryxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , jhrwbh = #{jhrwbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rybh =#{rybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mjjh = #{mjjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , dwdm = #{dwdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , dwmc =#{dwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from chas_yw_jhry where isdel = 0 and ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select * from chas_yw_jhry
1=1 and isdel = 0
and rybh = '${rybh}'
and baqid = '${baqid}'
and jhrwbh = '${jhrwbh}'
